TopicTitle: So today is the 20th. Anything special going on?

Articles.Content:
As you all should know today is the Apollo 11 Moon landing anniversary. Are you doing anything special? Me? I wrote up a nice post on another forum I've been apart of since I was a kid. My little outreach attempt on gamespot.com. (56k) Its a bit watered down, but tell me what you think.

There is one thing eating at me...no. I'm downright pissed.

Science Channel? NASA unexplained files. Discovery Channel? Naked and Afraid. National Geographic? Survive the Apocalypse. History Channel? Mountain Men. History2? Stan Lee's Super Humans.

...*sigh*... People suck.
Probably just another day of KSP but happy moon day! (I call it that)

Probably just another day of KSP but happy moon day! (I call it that)

But today is sun day, tomorrow is moon day
My dad's celebrating his birthday, so there's that.

I got to watch the moon landing and walk live. It was something to behold. I hope Neil got to stand once more at Tranquility Base before he headed off among the stars.

Nasa TV is rebroadcast whole event at 10:39 PM US EDT

Edited July 21, 2014 by Voidryder
